heading: gimme redmond
subheading: competition not long after jerry hall split with mick jagger, the glamazon reportedly was spotted aboard paul allen’s yacht, hanging out with the microsoft cofounder and world’s third-richest man. the still-in-beta romance between supermodel and supergeek is further evidence that computer moguls will reign as the rock stars of the 21st century. in fact, a […]
author: tom mcnichol
